ValidationRule.description: This rule fies an error if a user chooses one of the Place Holders that is included in the Territory Picklist
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Territory__c , "--None--") || ISPICKVAL( Territory__c , "-- US --") || ISPICKVAL( Territory__c , "-- CANADA --") || ISPICKVAL( Territory__c , "-- LATIN AMERICA --") || ISPICKVAL( Territory__c , "-- Other Regions --")
